Best Solution for Teams Managing Support and Tracking Time

 

SherpaDesk’s ticketing system makes receiving, routing, responding and reporting on customer support issues easy for you and your team.

 

 

Complete Visibility of the Support Issue in One Place

 

Email Ticketing

Takes no time to set up email dropboxes to start receiving tickets. Set up unique dropboxes for basic support (i.e. support@yourcompany.com), hardware outages, priority issues, etc.

 

Getting Things Done Faster

• Related tickets: Group identical incidents for easier management and updates.

• SSO for Authentication: Use existing credentials to login to SherpaDesk.

• Routing: Have specific issues routed directly to a support queue or technician for quicker resolution.

• Custom Forms:: Create dynamic forms to help clearly define the users issue.

 

Service Level Agreements

Set and meet response and completion times with service level agreements. You can define times for each priority and then reports to measure your team's success.

Time Based Notifications

Create notifications based on events and time elapsed on any type of ticket. Never let important customer support issues fall through the cracks.

Self Portal

Create a personalized support experience for you customers. Make your portal to look and feel like your website complete with knowledgebase, chat and custom ticket interface.

 

 

 

 

SherpaDesk is a great tool for small IT service providers. Ticketing, comments and time logging works seamlessly and our customer happiness has grown after we started to use it.

 

— JOHN GALLIMORE, CTO

 

 

 

Live Chat

Integrated chat allows you to speak directly with user. Expand the chat to either show your desktop or take control of the user’s desktop in support.

 

Preventative Maintenance

Create recurring tasks on a schedule so that routine service can be done to ensure your organization stays optimal and running.

 

Time Based Notifications

Create notifications based on events and time elapsed on any type of ticket. Never let important customer support issues fall through the cracks.

 

 

 

Stay Connected with Your Customers from Anywhere

 

Create and Respond to Support

Integrated chat allows you to speak directly with user. Expand the chat to either show your desktop or take control of the user’s desktop in support.

 

Track Time and Expenses

Easily track time and expenses to support issues or to your accounts. Never let those pesky billable time issues fall through the cracks again!

 

Send Out Invoices

Ready to send out invoices? Push out completed invoices and select who receives these auto-magically from your phone.

 

Complete To-Dos

Stay on top of your tasks or create new ones while out in the field. Avoid the ‘Derni’t I forgot to install that switch’ syndrome as you are leaving the parking lot.
